name: coderdojo-first-game-server
description: CoderDojo First Game Server [CDFGS] Is a component of [Project HSI]'s CDFG Launcher. It is the be used in conjuction with a web browser [localhost:8980] or with the CDFG Electron Client. [CDFGEC] The code in it's entirely can be found on ProjectHSI/coderdojo-first-game-launcher.
